parameters: ???: Watch out, \N[1]!
???: Whew! That was a close one.
\N[1]: Huff...huff...! Ugh, that was tough...
???: Here, I'll heal you up.
\C[6]??? helped you recover to full health!
???: Now let's try again. Confront the enemy once more
when you're ready.
\N[1]: Huff...huff...! Ugh, that was tough...
???: Here, I'll heal you up.
\C[6]??? helped you recover to full health!
???: Now let's try again. Confront the enemy once more
when you're ready.
Alisha: STOP PULLING MY HAIR STACEY!
Stacey: YOU'RE STEPPING ON MY FOOT!!
Alisha: I can't believe you parade around in that
outfit around school.
Stacey: We're all wearing the same outfit. WE HAVE A
SCHOOL UNIFORM!
Alisha and Stacey: W H O  I S  T H E R E ?
Sparkly Models: WE WILL SHOW YOU TRUE PERFECTION!
Sparkly Models: KWWWAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!
\N[1]: Huff...huff...! Ugh, that was tough...
???: Here, I'll heal you up.
\C[6]??? helped you recover to full health!
???: Now let's try again. Confront the enemy once more
when you're ready.
Stacey: *huff* *puff* What.. what were we even
fighting about?
Alisha: *exhausted* I.. I have no idea..
Alisha: Makeup...?
Stacey: Alisha, you always look so pretty without
makeup. I wish I could look the same.
Alisha: Stacey, you look beautiful with and without
makeup. I just don't wear makeup because it's
expensive to replace, but I'd love to wear it for
special occasions.
Stacey: You would look beautiful with makeup on too.
???: Looks like your work here is done, \N[1].
MainCharacter
MainCharacterBattler
Stacey: I'm sorry I was rude to you, Alisha.
Alisha: I'm sorry too, Stacey.
Alisha: Let's get coffee and hang out later. I am
craving a mocha frappuccino.
Stacey: Let's!
